backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, roles, location types, gate pass and inventory types, with authorization checks and profile CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short predefined summaries for selected frontend files.
frontend/docs/api-design.md: Describes the backend API endpoints, authorization rules, and data contracts for the system.
frontend/docs/database-schema.md: Outlines intended persistent data structures for the backend.
frontend/docs/project-structure.md: High-level recommended folder and module layout for frontend and backend.
frontend/docs/ui-wireframes.md: Text-based UI wireframes and navigation matrix for all key role-based screens.
frontend/docs/user-stories.md: User stories and acceptance criteria for major workflows like gate passes, receiving, and security confirmation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the frontend app and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/api/actorClient.ts: Wraps useActor to expose typed actor methods for user profiles and placeholder backend operations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile loading, and rendering login or profile setup states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a dialog for collecting and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Displays a status badge with labels and colors based on gatepass, stocktake, or exception status maps.
frontend/src/features/README.md: Describes the structure and purpose of feature modules such as gate pass, receiving, security, inventory, stocktake, reports, and audit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and managing login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for user profiles and placeholder backend actions with invalidation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark theme variables for a logistics-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/shared/constants/hu.ts: Defines HU type constants, labels, descriptions, and helpers for inventory and security logic.
frontend/src/shared/constants/roles.ts: Defines role constants, labels, descriptions, permissions, and helper checks for role-based access.
frontend/src/shared/constants/status.ts: Provides status enums, labels, and color mappings for gate passes, stock takes, exceptions, inventory, and locations.
frontend/src/shared/queryKeys.ts: Central list of React Query keys and key factories for caching API data.
frontend/src/shared/types/domain.ts: TypeScript interfaces modeling user profiles, locations, gate passes, inventory, stock takes, exceptions, reports, and audit data.
frontend/src/utils/exporters.ts: Utility functions to format data and export various reports to CSV, including date formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, fonts, animations, and theme tokens.
project_state.json: Defines overall HU Management System state including version, high-level functional scope, architectural notes, and existing features. Captures inventory rules, auditing requirements, reporting needs, and project capabilities for planning.
